## [Deep Learning about deep ancestry: Demonstrating how genetic testing services can predict your heritage from your DNA](https://brouwern.github.io/DL_about_deep_ancestry/)

This website provides and overview of how machine learning is used in genomic data analysis and demonstrates using open-access data and Python. how a person's ancestry can be characterized from a DNA sample.


## [Unity in Diversity: Genetic similarities and differences between populations in the 1000 Genomes dataset](https://brouwern.github.io/posit_tables_2024/)

This website is my submission to the 2024 Posit Tables competition and demonstrates how complex data science results can be presented in an annotated heat map using the Great Tables Python package.
